lead_paragraph: A man sentenced to sweat out his debt to society on a prison farm refuses to compromise with authority. This 'failure to communicate' gets him in all kinds of trouble. Kennedy won Oscar as leader of the chain gang.
snippet: A man sentenced to sweat out his debt to society on a prison farm refuses to compromise with authority. This 'failure to communicate' gets him in all kinds of trouble. Kennedy won Oscar as leader of the chain gang.
